item.name: Scarf tiovivo
item.description: A silk scarf to fall in love with… for its design and its touch. The basis of its design is the Carnival poster made by Willsons Leicester and it transmits the joy of a festive day. An accessory that will give you style and elegance... it is discrete and at the same time striking because of its originality. With a combination of colours that work together with black, ochre, deep-red, greyish blue, khaki green, white garments... the possibilities are infinite; your imagination is the limit. Multiple possibilities for a very special silk scarf.

item.name: Scarf temple of the jaguars
item.description: We travel to the Mayan civilization, to its art and culture. In particular, we are going to Chichen Itza, to the north of the peninsula of Yucatán, in Mexico. The temple of the jaguars design make us travel back in time and evokes the magic of earlier times. Motifs in blue, yellows and ochres colours, in contrast with black, make this silk scarf a special and different accessory, which stands out for its cultural background and attractive colouring.

item.name: Scarf nautical atlas
item.description: The nautical atlas silk scarf takes us to the nautical voyages of past centuries… sailors with maps, compasses and telescopes, commercial trading routes for exotic products… It evokes the travelling sensations of sailors with or without a set course. Everybody get on board! The design is based on a part of the nautical map of the Mediterranean Sea by Pietro Giovanni Prunus, where the compass rose and the fleur-de-lis can be appreciated that indicates the north.

item.name: Scarf senecio
item.description: Base on the design of artwork, ‘Senecio’, where Paul Klee represents a human face using different colours and geometrical shapes, with a great similarity with an harlequin costume. This artwork belongs to a collection of the painter that is related with the world of the theatre. An elegant design in brown and orange tones, on a silk scarf that has a very smooth, silky touch. You will want to wear it all times!

item.name: Scarf mother & child
item.description: A loving hug from a mother to her child. Design based on the artword ‘Mother & Child’ by Paul Klee, which transmits the tenderness of the moment with the incomparable style of the painter. An elegant silk scarf for yourself or for a mother that has just had a baby, but in any case, an unforgettable and with great style present.

item.name: Scarf apolo
item.description: With distinguished style and elegance, this silk scarf transmits the grandeur of the mythological Gods and of classic Greek art. The representation of this design derives from a Greek vase that shows the God Apollo riding a Griffin (a mythological animal). He appears playing the lyre, a musical instrument that the God Hermes created uniquely for him. It has a black background with yellow and orange-coloured motifs. Simplicity and elegance, mythology and the magic of the classic Gods come together in a timeless design.

item.name: Scarf blue sirocco
item.description: Sirocco in Italian or siroco in English. South-east wind, rough, rebellious, warm, irregular and unexpected… A wind deriving from the deserts of Arabia or the Sahara, strong, sometimes hurricane-force... that is brought into this design without an established order or direction, Errante spirit with maximum expression, where do you want it to take you? With a sky blue colour background, Sirocco takes you to the place where you want to be...

item.name: Scarf desert sand sirocco
item.description: Sirocco in Italian or siroco in English. South-east wind, rough, rebellious, warm, irregular and unexpected… A wind deriving from the deserts of Arabia or the Sahara, strong, sometimes hurricane-force... that is brought into this design without an established order or direction, Errante spirit with maximum expression, where do you want it to take you? With a desert sand colour background, Sirocco takes you to the place where you want to be...

item.name: Scarf esencia
item.description: The essence represented in the form of mandala, a kernel mode that gives us strength and courage, like a sun that gives us light and heat. We must keep in a safe place the essence that define and praises us. In brown tones, the design evokes the nature of the part our essence.

item.name: Scarf errante heart steel
item.description: An Errante heart that brings elegance to your movements. A simple design, asymmetric… for whomever is looking to be different and does not let themselves be defined, like you. Let the wind guide you... be Errante... be free... In a steel grey colour you will bring a subtle hardness to this Errante heart, making it unbreakable.

item.name: Scarf errante heart bronze
item.description: An irreverent Corazón Errante that brings elegance to your movements. A simple design, asymmetric… for whomever is looking to be different and does not let themselves be classified, like you. Let the wind guide you… be Errante... be free… In a bronze colour you will bring a warm shine to this Corazón Errante.

item.name: Scarf errante heart old gold
item.description: A mysterious Errante heart that brings elegance to your movements. A simple design, asymmetric… for whomever is looking to be different and does not let themselves be defined, like you. Let the wind guide you… be Errante... be free… In an old gold colour you will bring a touch of luxury and with certain solemn air and maturity to this Errante heart.

item.name: Scarf errante heart blue
item.description: A restless Errante heart that brings elegance to your movements. A simple design, asymmetric… for whomever is looking to be different and does not let themselves be classified, like you. Let the wind guide you… be Errante... be free… In a clear blue colour you will bring delicacy and innocence to this Errante heart.

item.name: Scarf errante heart lilac
item.description: A restless Errante heart that brings elegance to your movements. A simple design, asymmetric… for whomever is looking to be different and does not let themselves be defined, like you. Let the wind guide you… be Errante... be free… In a lilac colour you will bring magic and delicate elegance to this Errante heart.

item.name: Scarf errante heart sand
item.description: An elegant Errante heart that brings elegance to your movements. A simple design, asymmetric… for whomever is looking to be different and does not let themselves be defined, like you. Let the wind guide you… be Errante... be free… In a sand colour you will bring delicacy and warmth to this Errante heart.

item.name: Scarf poem xxviii pink
item.description: A message on a silk scarf… you will be able to read it at any time and delight in this poem written by Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer. Or consider it as a gift… "Say it with silk". An original and different silk scarf, it mixes spanish literary tradition and modern design, with a romantic message included. The text of the silk scarf is as follows: Cuando entre la sombra oscura perdida una voz murmura turbando su triste calma, si en el fondo de mi alma la oigo dulce resonar, dime: ¿es que el viento en sus giros se queja, o que tus suspiros me hablan de amor al pasar? Cuando el sol en mi ventana rojo brilla a la mañana, y mi amor tu sombra evoca, si en mi boca de otra boca sentir creo la impresión, dime: ¿es que ciego deliro o que un beso en un suspiro me envía tu corazón? Si en el luminoso día y en la alta noche sombría, si en todo cuanto rodea al alma que te desea te creo sentir y ver, dime: ¿es que toco y respiro soñando, o que en un suspiro me das tu aliento a beber? Rimas y leyendas. Rima XXVIII Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer

item.name: Scarf poem xxviii brown
item.description: A message in a scarf ... You can read it at any time and delight in this poem by Gustavo Adolfo Becquer. Or give it away ... "Say it with silk." An original and different scarf, mixed spanish literary tradition and modern design with a romantic message included. The text of the scarf is as follows: Cuando entre la sombra oscura perdida una voz murmura turbando su triste calma, si en el fondo de mi alma la oigo dulce resonar, dime: ¿es que el viento en sus giros se queja, o que tus suspiros me hablan de amor al pasar? Cuando el sol en mi ventana rojo brilla a la mañana, y mi amor tu sombra evoca, si en mi boca de otra boca sentir creo la impresión, dime: ¿es que ciego deliro o que un beso en un suspiro me envía tu corazón? Si en el luminoso día y en la alta noche sombría, si en todo cuanto rodea al alma que te desea te creo sentir y ver, dime: ¿es que toco y respiro soñando, o que en un suspiro me das tu aliento a beber? Rimas y leyendas. Rima XXVIII Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer

item.name: Scarf blue jewel
item.description: An extra long scarf in soft satin blue. Its great length, 240 cm, allows you to take infinite forms. Its narrow format makes it suitable for wearing as an extra long neck scarf or waist as a sash or belt.Let your imagination do the rest! It is surrounded on all sides with small trinkets in light blue color, which simulates the effect of a jewel. Bears the Errante logo embroidered on center.

item.name: Echarpe enchantment - with black satin border
item.description: Everyone will turn his head to look at you. Be different, elegant, seduce… A touch of distinction and exoticism so that you glare with every step. With the Echarpe Enchantment you will add style to a simple black dress, you will not need anything else in order to be the centre of everyone’s attention. An ethnic style, with feathers moved by the wind and beads... an echarpe of subtle elegance that will be spectacular around your shoulders. Its large dimensions will allow you to use it however you like, with several ways to wear it. You can wear it over your shoulders or around the waist as an overskirt, tied or held in place with a brooch... your imagination will do the rest! Seduce... with Enchantment.

item.description: Everyone will turn his head to look at you. Be different, elegant, seduce… A touch of distinction and exoticism so that you glare with every step. item.name: Echarpe apolo - with ocher satin bordered
item.description: With distinguished style and elegance, this shawl transmits the grandeur of the mythological Gods and of classic greek art. The representation of this design derives from a Greek vase that shows the God Apollo riding a Griffin (a mythological animal). He appears playing the lyre, a musical instrument that the God Hermes created uniquely for him. It has a black background and yellow and orange-coloured motifs. Simplicity and elegance, mythology and the magic of the classic Gods come together in a timeless design. It is also reversible and on the other side it has the Errante logo. Its large dimensions will allow you to use it however you like, with several ways to wear it. You can wear it over your shoulders or around the waist as an overskirt, tied or held in place with a brooch... and it will always bring elegance to each one of your movements...

item.name: Echarpe apolo - con plumas de avestruz negro

item.name: Red echarpe opera
item.description: A silk gauze echarpe in red vermilion, whose transparency will provide a subtle elegance. Its light weight and large dimensions allow you to use it as you wish, with multiple possibilities of fitting. The bottom is trimmed with small beads of the same color as the silk gauze.

item.name: Echarpe irbis
item.description: A echarpe which transmits elegance and feline majesty. Its name honors the beauty of the irbis or snow leopard, feline mysterious that lurks in high cliffs. This echarpe evokes his gray coat and long tail that curls in to keep warm. It is made of light grayish brown velvet with subtle gray lines and the bottom is trimmed with gray hair.

item.name: Echarpe camouflage
item.description: A soft jersey echarpe in gray-green color. Small feathers decorated surrounding give it an original twist that makes it very special.

item.name: Echarpe empire
item.description: Awesome cotton velvet echarpe garnet and large dimensions, that achieves a very distinguished and elegant bearing. Their feathers garnet, purple and green pistachio and provide a special twist.Wrap yourself in its warmth!

item.name: Echarpe blue night falcon
item.description: An echarpe which transmits the majesty of a falcon in flight. In crepe satin midnight blue and embroidered on the back. The bottom is trimmed with black feathers in dark blue tones.

item.name: Echarpe bouquet
item.description: An elegant and sensual echarpe with transparencies and unequal drawings of roses in beige and gold thread. Its large dimensions, 200 cm x 58 cm, fits easily on different positions.

item.name: Eggplant swirling echarpe
item.description: An elegant on satin echarpe with great body and consistency, giving a distinguished bearing on his shoulders. In dark eggplant., embroidery and feathered in eggplant and pistachio green colors at the ends A very special combination.

item.name: Chocolate brown swirling echarpe
item.description: A crepe satin echarpe in chocolate brown, with long beaded embroidery and a mixture of brown and green colors on the ends.

item.name: Pink swirling echarpe
item.description: An echarpe in pink crepe satin, embroidered and with long pink beads at the ends.

item.name: Squared echarpe
item.description: A small echarpe patterned with squares in shades of brown toasted and gray. It is topped with beads as small berries in the same tones at the ends.

item.name: Reef pendant
item.description: Beautiful combination of Agatha dyed in fuchsia with a dragonfly perched on her.

item.name: Panther pendant
item.description: A combination of elegance Agatha dyed black and a small dragonfly on it.

item.name: Omán pendant
item.description: Elegant necklace made of natural quartz and a small inn dragonfly.

item.name: Butterfly brooch made on murano glass - blue color
item.description: Brooch with a beautiful and delicate butterfly in Murano glass. A beautiful accessory made on thisartistic glass blowed with unparalleled beauty and quality, created on the island of Murano, near Venice (Italy). The tradition of the best glass blowers masters for centuries. © Murano Vitrum original product. Handmade product with the technical 'Lume' Murano Glam in her atelier in Mogliano Veneto.

item.name: Butterfly brooch made on murano glass - maroon color
item.description: Brooch with a beautiful and delicate butterfly in Murano glass. A beautiful accessory for the art glass blowing unparalleled beauty and quality, created on the island of Murano, near Venice (Italy). The tradition of the best glass blowers masters for centuries. © Murano Vitrum original product. Handmade product with the technical 'Lume' Murano Glam in her atelier in Mogliano Veneto.

item.name: Bunch of grapes brooch on murano glass - white color
item.description: A beautiful and magnetic bunch of grapes, with attractive colors and transparencies, made in Murano glass. Each bunch is different because it is handmade. A beautiful accessory made on thisartistic glass blowed with unparalleled beauty and quality, created on the island of Murano, near Venice (Italy). The tradition of the best glass blowers masters for centuries. © Murano Vitrum original product. Product handmade by Murano Glam in her atelier in Mogliano Veneto.

item.name: Bunch of grapes brooch on murano glass - lilac color
item.description: A beautiful and magnetic bunch of grapes, with attractive colors and transparencies, made in Murano glass. Each bunch is different because it is handmade. A beautiful accessory made on thisartistic glass blowed with unparalleled beauty and quality, created on the island of Murano, near Venice (Italy). The tradition of the best glass blowers masters for centuries. © Murano Vitrum original product. Product handmade by Murano Glam in her atelier in Mogliano Veneto.

item.name: Great gala lux mask
item.description: Mystery and seduction in a Venetian mask of great beauty and magnetism. It is made in black lacquered metal ultralight and shows an elaborate filigree with small details, is further embellished with tiny Swarovski crystals. For an important gala or simply for you. It can be worn (tied with a ribbon at the back of the head) or be an original decoration. Original Venetian mask made in Venice (Italy), combining traditional skills of local craftsmen and new contemporary decorative techniques.

item.name: Smoking lux mask
item.description: Venetian mask with f iligree of small details in an harmonious set of different geometric shapes. It is made of lightweight black lacquered metal and includes small Swarovski crystals. It can be worn (tied with a ribbon at the back of the head) or be an original decoration. Original Venetian mask made in Venice (Italy), combining traditional skills of local craftsmen and new contemporary decorative techniques.

item.name: Pavone lux mask
item.description: Venetian mask inspired by the splendor of the peacock. It is made of lightweight black lacquered metal and includes small Swarovski crystals. It can be worn (tied with a ribbon at the back of the head) or be an original decoration. Made in Venice (Italy) Original Venetian mask, joining traditional skills of local craftsmen and new contemporary decorative techniques

item.name: Gatto new lux mask
item.description: Venetian mask representing feline sensuality. It is made of lightweight black lacquered metal and includes small Swarovski crystals. It can be worn (tied with a ribbon at the back of the head) or be an original decoration. Made in Venice (Italy) Original Venetian mask, joining traditional skills of local craftsmen and new contemporary decorative techniques

item.name: Columbine musical mask
item.description: Traditional Venetian Mask, which combines the traditional symbols of the Carnival of Venice: Musical notes and red, black and gold colors. It is handmade by craftsmen in a smooth and comfortable wearing paper mache. It can be used as a supplement (tied with a ribbon at the back of the head) or be an original decoration. Original Venetian mask handmade in Venice (Italy), according the traditional techniques of local artisans.

item.name: Gatto music mask
item.description: The Venetian Carnival is characterized by its elegance and for his good humor, which began as a response to the economic and political crisis of the sixteenth century in Italy. This Venetian mask depicting a cat with traditional musical notes and black, maroon and gold colors. Can be used as a complement or be an original decoration. Original Venetian mask handmade in Venice (Italy), according the traditional techniques of local artisans.

item.name: Collar over jersey natural feathers
item.description: A very colorful and original complement which enables you to decorate your sweaters with simplicity and style. Specially designed to carry under a turtleneck, it will look like to form part of the jersey that you are wearing. You can change the color of neck feathers on the same jersey and make them look different.

item.name: Tenor scarf
item.description: Elegant Tenor scarf is a tribute to the long notes that a tenor sustained in his singing represented with threads that wrap you ... like his voice ... The colors are soft and with a pleasant touch.

item.name: Máscara colombina art decó negro
item.description: Stylish unisex Venetian mask inspired by the works of Gustav Klimt in Venice. Design in black, silver and gold colors that conveys the glamor of the Art Deco. It is handmade by craftsmen in a smooth and comfortable to wear paper mache. It can be used as a supplement (tied with a ribbon at the back of the head) or be an original decoration. Original Venetian mask handmade in Venice (Italy), where the techniques of local artisans.

item.name: Settecento shiny gold black mask
item.description: Unisex design elegant Venetian mask with glitter in luxurious black and gold colors. It can be used as a supplement (tied with a ribbon at the back of the head) or be an original decoration. Original Venetian mask handmade in Venice (Italy), where the techniques of local artisans.

item.name: Bauta barocco silver mask
item.description: The traditional Venetian mask male nobility. With baroque style and great presence. Can be used as a complement or be an original decoration. Original Venetian mask handmade in Venice (Italy), where the techniques of local artisans.

item.name: Jolly reale macramé mask
item.description: A Venetian mask with eye mask on macrame and sound of bells, spectacular! Original Venetian mask handmade in Venice (Italy), acording to the traditional tecniques of local artisans.

item.description: A sumptuous mask with attractive colors and sound of bells. Original Venetian mask handmade in Venice (Italy), acording to the traditional techniques of local artisans.

item.name: Face profile david by michelangelo - golden color
item.description: A real reproduction of the face profile of David by Michelangelo, a masterpiece of Renaissance. This sculpture is also a tribute to the struggle for individual liberties.

item.name: Face profile david by michelangelo - silver color
item.description: A real reproduction of the face profile of David by Michelangelo, a masterpiece of Renaissance. This sculpture is also a tribute to the struggle for individual liberties.

item.name: African mask turtles
item.description: The African handicrafts has a magical and ritual character. An ethnic style for your home or office that will transport you to the African culture. Mask made from wood and shells, with representation of two turtles in the central part and the protection of the eagle on the top. Exoticism will flood any room!

item.name: African mask salamanders
item.description: The African handicrafts has a magical and ritual character. An ethnic style for your home or office that will transport you to the African culture. Mask made from wood and shells, with representation of two salamanders in the central part and the protection of the eagle on the top. Exoticism will flood any room!

item.name: Mask with symmetrical patterns headdress
item.description: An exotic and elegant ethnic handicraft. Carved wood mask with headdress of symmetrical drawings. Exoticism will flood any room!

item.name: Mask with feather headdress and flowers
item.description: An exotic and elegant ethnic handicraft. Carved wood mask with headdress adorned with drawings of feathers and small flowers. It will distinguish any room with great style!

item.name: Trochus niloticus shell
item.description: Whether for decoration or paperweight, at home or in the office, this natural shell Trochus Niloticus relaxes and takes us to a relaxing marine environment. Is cone shaped and a beautiful pearly natural shine.

item.name: Set of three spheres of selenite
item.description: Set of three spheres of polished selenite will give an elegant natural style to any stay. Its translucent and glacial appearance is tremendously beautiful and magnetic. There are various hypotheses about the origin of the name of selenite. Some say it comes from the old popular belief that the mineral came from the moon, so they called in a manner similar to the Greek moon goddess Selene. Moreover, a Central European legend says that is called so because its crystals are formed in a crescent moon. In any case, selenite conveys peace and serenity. With this set of spheres, adds beauty and relaxation to your home.

item.name: Polished selenite heart
item.description: Beautiful polished selenite heart, which can be used as decoration, paperweights in an office, etc.. Its translucent and glacial appearance is tremendously beautiful and magnetic. There are various hypotheses about the origin of the name of selenite. Some say it comes from the old popular belief that the mineral came from the moon, so they called in a manner similar to the Greek moon goddess Selene. Moreover, a Central European legend says that is called so because its crystals are formed in a crescent moon. In any case, selenite conveys peace and serenity. A heart that adds beauty and relaxation.

item.name: Polished himalayan salt heart
item.description: Gives away a different heart ... this is Himalayan salt polished and can be used as decoration, paperweights in an office, etc.. Her pink-orange color makes subtle and delicate. Himalayan salt is the purest on earth that exists and is appreciated for its beneficial properties. Its formation in marine deposits goes back to the Jurassic Era. Beauty formed over millions of years ...
